data.title: Centerville, Iowa
data.text:
$349,900

3 Beds ⋅ 2 Baths ⋅ 6320224 MLS

Welcome to your country escape, nestled just 10 minutes from Centerville, IA sitting on approx. 2.480 Acres M/L. This meticulously maintained property with many upgrades offers 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, 2 Car Oversized Attached Garage, providing a perfect blend of rustic charm and modern convenience. Situated on a well-kept acreage, this home is accessed by a peaceful 1/2-mile gravel drive. Step inside to discover a stunning new 4 Seasons Family Room, ideal for enjoying year-round comfort and breathtaking views of the surrounding landscape or enjoy from the two decks. The home features brand-new metal roof & gutters, new interior paint, new flooring, new lighting, and newer windows that brighten the space with natural light. The kitchen is a culinary delight, boasting beautiful granite countertops, elegant Hickory cabinets, and ample space for all your cooking needs. Whether youâre hosting family dinners or enjoying a quiet meal, this expansive kitchen is sure to impress along with the massive formal dining room. Outside, youâll find four well-maintained buildings, each with a new metal roof, providing ample storage and versatility. Plenty of deck space to invite you to relax and soak in the peaceful countryside. This property combines modern updates with the tranquility of rural living, offering an ideal retreat for those seeking both comfort and space. Call soon - a must see!

23873 160th Avenue, Centerville

Listing courtesy of .

$250,000

3 Beds ⋅ 2 Baths ⋅ 6320162 MLS

Welcome to country living at its finest! Nestled on a stunning 5-acre parcel, this charming 3-bedroom, 2-bath ranch home is the perfect retreat. Step inside to discover a newly remodeled kitchen designed for the ultimate entertaining experience, featuring modern cabinets, elegant counter tops, a farmhouse sink, stylish back splash, and stainless steel appliances. The inviting living room boasts a custom-built fireplace, while a newer sun room addition, completed in 2021, offers a serene space to relax and enjoy the picturesque surroundings. The property also includes a convenient laundry room, a spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bath, and an outdoor oasis perfect for gatherings. Enjoy your evenings by the fire pit, soak in the grain bin-covered hot tub, or unwind in the beautifully landscaped yard with stunning views. Impress your guests with your very own private bar, complete with custom design and climate control. The 30 x 48 detached garage features an over sized door, ideal for larger vehicles or recreational toys, while a 28 x 36 barn is perfect for your hobby farm or 4-H projects. Heated livestock waterer. Don't have animals? No problem! Two cows can stay with the property if you choose. This home is a hidden gem that packs a punchâdon't wait, it won't last long!

24721 240th Avenue, Centerville

Listing courtesy of .

$215,000

3 Beds ⋅ 2 Baths ⋅ 6320089 MLS

Welcome home! This beautiful ranch-style residence, built less than 10 years ago, offers the perfect blend of modern comfort and classic charm. Boasting 3 spacious bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms, this home accommodates both relaxation and everyday living with ease. The open kitchen and living area create an inviting space for family gatherings and entertaining, while the master bedroom suite provides a private retreat complete with a master bath with double sinks. Enjoy the convenience of a full basement, perfect for storage or additional living space, and an attached 2-car garage for your vehicles and hobbies. Need additional space? Carport and shed in the back yard, stay with the property. Large, covered, front porch, where you can unwind while enjoying the outdoors rain or shine. Don't miss the opportunity to make this great home yours!

204 E Grant Street, Centerville

Listing courtesy of .

$275,000

4 Beds ⋅ 2 Baths ⋅ 6320024 MLS

Welcome to your dream home nestled in a highly sought-after neighborhood! This stunning residence boasts a beautifully modernized kitchen featuring sleek quartz countertops and top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances, perfect for culinary enthusiasts. With four spacious bedrooms and two well-appointed bathrooms, there's plenty of room for family and guests. The walk-out basement is an entertainer's paradise, complete with ample space for gatherings and recreation. Situated on just over 2 acres of picturesque yard space, you'll enjoy the tranquility of nature right in your backyard. Don't miss this opportunity to own a beautiful home that combines modern living with ample space for entertaining and relaxation!

20367 E Terra Vista, Centerville

Listing courtesy of .

$299,900

4 Beds ⋅ 3 Baths ⋅ 6320010 MLS

SECLUDED PEACEFUL LIVING WITH MATURE TREES surrounding your fenced in back yard. This beautiful spacious 4 Bedroom, 3 Bath, 2 Car Attached Garage home has over 2,912 square feet of living space and is located on 1.44 acres m/l. The view from the 4 seasons room right off of your dining room is like paradise. You will love the natural light the 4 seasons room offers, and you can walk out to lower deck to enjoy the great outdoors. The kitchen has new Quartz countertops and stove top. The Master Bedroom offers two nice size closets and ensuite bath offers a large jet bathtub. The main bath has a new standup shower. The home has had many updates. The lower deck has all been raised and replaced along with the wrought iron fencing. The poles to the sunroom have been wrapped and new cedar and roof was added under sunroom area where hot tub is located.

2028 Golfview Circle, Centerville

Listing courtesy of .

$99,999

2 Beds ⋅ 1 Baths ⋅ 6320004 MLS

Charming 2-Bedroom Modern Ranch Style Home, Attached Garage, Prime Location, Great Investment. This move-in-ready, modern contemporary has 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, efficient makes everyday living a breeze. With sleek laminate flooring throughout and a stylish finish, this home offers both comfort and elegance. The main level features an open and inviting layout, with a spacious living area perfect for relaxing or entertaining. The kitchen and bath connect to the living space. Enjoy the convenience of having your choice of laundry facilities on the main level or downstairs. The attached garage provides secure parking and additional storage space, while the small, easy-to-maintain backyard with a covered porch is perfect for outdoor relaxation without the hassle of extensive upkeep. Bonus it has a fenced in yard for your pets. The bathroom is well-designed with a tub-shower unit, offering a practical and comfortable space. The two bedrooms provide ample space for rest and personalization, ensuring a cozy retreat at the end of the day. Situated within walking distance of downtown, this home places you near shopping, dining, and entertainment options. Additionally, it's conveniently close to schools and the YMCA, making it ideal for families and those with an active lifestyle. This property combines modern living with an unbeatable location. Don't miss your chance to make this contemporary gem your ownâschedule a viewing today!

611 S 12th, Centerville

Listing courtesy of .

$300,000

4 Beds ⋅ 3 Baths ⋅ 6319990 MLS

Welcome to this stunning 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom home in Centerville's charming City Park neighborhood. This residence boasts an open-concept design, blending modern comforts with elegant touches. Step inside to find wood floors throughout most of the home, enhanced by natural light and beautiful lighting features. The spacious family room is perfect for gatherings, and the kitchen is a chef's dream, featuring stainless steel appliances, a double oven, and a convection cooktop. One bedroom offers the ideal space for a home office, catering to todayâs lifestyle needs. The fully finished basement adds valuable living space, complete with custom cabinetry and a convenient laundry room. Recent upgrades include a new roof in 2023 and a front porch completed in early summer 2024, with new vinyl siding and a brick front. Enjoy outdoor living on the composite decking of both the front porch and back deck, overlooking the beautifully landscaped, secluded backyard with mature trees. Additional features include an underground fencing system installed in 2021 and a storage shed for extra belongings. Located in a vibrant neighborhood with a beautiful park and convenient access to amenities, this home offers both comfort and practicality. Don't miss the chance to make it yours!

840 S Park Street, Centerville

Listing courtesy of .

$149,000

3 Beds ⋅ 1 Baths ⋅ 6319802 MLS

This charming 3-bedroom, 1-bathroom home with a 2-car attached garage is a gem in terms of both charm and affordability. Situated in a prime location close to schools and the YMCA, it offers convenience and accessibility. The property has been well maintained, boasting numerous improvements including Pella windows, new flooring, gas fireplace, and custom built-ins. The spacious eat-in kitchen is not only aesthetically pleasing but also designed for optimal functionality. Additionally, the owner is generously including all appliances â dishwasher, range, refrigerator, washer, and dryer, making this home move-in ready. Outside youâll find a lovely backyard, perfect for outdoor enjoyment and relaxation. Donât let this opportunity pass you by. Schedule a viewing today to truly appreciate all that this home has to offer. This is a must-see property that could be your next dream home!

824 S Main Street, Centerville

Listing courtesy of .

$254,900

4 Beds ⋅ 3 Baths ⋅ 6319604 MLS

This beautiful 4 bedroom, 2 bath home is nestled on a serene city street, boasts a sprawling lot of over an acre adorned with fruit trees in the backyard. From the expansive back deck, you'll enjoy stunning views, perfect for entertaining. The open kitchen floor plan with large kitchen island and beautiful cabinetry is equipped with a complete stainless steel appliance package. Upgrades abound throughout the home, including exquisite tile work in the bathrooms, with the primary bedroom featuring a custom-built tile shower. The main living areas showcase engineered wood floors, large newer windows for lots of natural light and flooring is complemented by coordinating carpet in all the bedrooms. Laundry is on the main level. The lower level offers a spacious family room with a cozy wood fireplace. You have a large basement perfect for extra space and storage. The large two-car garage provides additional work space. NEW ROOF 2023, Furnace and AC 2015. This home is meticulous so set up your showing today!

20358 E Terra Vista, Centerville

Listing courtesy of .

$315,000

4 Beds ⋅ 2 Baths ⋅ 6319549 MLS

Nestled in a prime location surrounded by beautiful mature trees, this stunning two-story home 4 bedrooms, 2 baths with a fully finished basement and basement has been plumed for another bathroom. This is ideal blend of comfort and convenience. Located just miles from Rathbun Lake, this home is perfect for those who love nature and outdoor activities. You will enjoy the 2 car attached garage. The home features a complete appliance package and has been meticulously maintained, including a newer furnace and central air system, with the roof being approximately 4 years old. The spacious 28 x 40 garage adds 5 extra spaces for cars or boats, built in 2001, boasts insulated walls and ceilings, electric power, and floor drains, making it perfect for various uses. 2 sheds stay! Enjoy the serene views from the back deck and the large, spacious kitchen, ideal for family gatherings and entertaining. Inside, the home offers cathedral ceilings and an abundance of space with four bedrooms and two bathrooms. The flexible layout allows for the laundry to be conveniently located on the main level or in the basement, depending on your preference. This home sits just shy of an acre m/l This home is being sold AS IS but has been very well maintained. The seller will take responsibility for the septic system. Don't miss the opportunity to own this beautiful home â call and see it today!

20388 221st Avenue, Centerville

Listing courtesy of .

$250,000

3 Beds ⋅ 2 Baths ⋅ 6319401 MLS

Welcome to your newly remodeled dream home! This spacious 3-bedroom, 2-full-bath residence boasts a fully finished basement with an additional non-conforming bedroom, perfect for guests or a home office. Situated on a generous half-acre lot in town, this property combines convenience with tranquility. The interior features brand-new appliances, ensuring both efficiency and style in the modern kitchen. Enjoy the expansive and beautiful backyard, ideal for entertaining or simply relaxing. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a stunning home that offers both comfort and contemporary living in a great location!

917 E Cross Street, Centerville

Listing courtesy of .

$205,000

3 Beds ⋅ 2 Baths ⋅ 6319302 MLS

Nestled on a quiet street in the heart of town, this beautiful ranch-style home epitomizes modern comfort and classic charm. This home has an updated interior, the residence features granite countertops and hardwood floors throughout.. Upon entry, you will find a spacious mud room/laundry room. There is a dedicated office space that offers convenience, ideal for remote work. The master suite will be sure to draw you in with its spacious layout, complete with an ensuite bathroom featuring a whirlpool tub and a stand-up shower. A generous walk-in closet provides ample storage, ensuring functionality meets luxury. Outside, a fenced-in backyard and meticulously landscaped grounds enhance privacy and curb appeal, offering a serene backdrop for relaxation or entertaining. With a detached 3-car garage adding convenience and space, this home presents a rare opportunity for those seeking style, comfort, and a peaceful lifestyle in a great location. Discover your new sanctuary today and envision the possibilities this exceptional property has to offer.

804 S 20th Street, Centerville

Listing courtesy of .
